contexts.context: ...day nice weather;very cold yesterday. You may <mark>need</mark> your coon coat, heavy hat or fur cap...
...white panelled round sitting room. (which we didn't <mark>need</mark> and later gave up.) Very weary and after some...
...we stayed thro' half of it but felt we <mark>needed</mark> sleep. Gail got a cab by her shrill...
...day nice weather;very cold yesterday. You may <mark>need</mark> your coon coat, heavy hat or fur cap...
